attributes.action: hold a full public inquiry into staff brutality at Wormwood Scrubs prison 1992-2001
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An internal Home Office report into brutality by officers at Wormwood Scrubs prison between these dates concluded that the brutality "often approximated to torture, and was of greater gravity than in any British prison, at least over the past 40 years". The Home Office has consistently refused any public scrutiny of what went on.
